name: Stickfight: Legend of Survival
description:
Stickfight: Legend of Survival is a physic-based stick fighting game. Fighting agains other sticks to become legend and get awesome rewards.
- Four stickman chaos-battle
- Physic-Based Fighting System
- Many levels with props
- Lots of weapons and upgrade system
- Explosion EVERYWHERE!
- Power ups to help you take advantage
How to play:
Simple like other game controller.
Use Left Joystick to move and aim and tap the attack or jump button to do things you want.
